meanings.definition: The state or fact of owning something.
meanings.sent1: Her ownerships of the toys made her feel responsible.
meanings.sent2: The ownerships of the house were transferred to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: His ownerships of the cookies vanished mysteriously overnight.
meanings.sent4: The ownerships of knowledge can never be taken away.
meanings.sent5: The ownerships of the treasure chest brought great joy to the children.

meanings.definition: The right to possess, use, and dispose of something.
meanings.sent1: The ownerships of the car allowed him to drive anywhere he pleased.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the ownerships of her grandmother's ring.
meanings.sent3: The ownerships of the remote control sparked a playful argument.
meanings.sent4: His ownerships of the land gave him a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The ownerships of the painting granted her the power to decide its fate.

meanings.definition: The act or process of owning something.
meanings.sent1: The ownerships of the company were divided among the partners.
meanings.sent2: His ownerships of the business grew over the years.
meanings.sent3: The ownerships of the keys were constantly misplaced.
meanings.sent4: Her ownerships of the recipe book made her a popular cook.
meanings.sent5: The ownerships of the house brought a sense of stability to the family.
